abilities.name: Mitosis
abilities.description: During the Status Phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

abilities.name: Munitions Reserves
abilities.description: At the start of each round of space combat, you may spend 2 trade goods; you may reroll any number of your dice during that combat round.

abilities.name: Armada
abilities.description: The maximum number of non-fighter ships you can have in each system is equal to 2 more than the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

abilities.name: Scavenge
abilities.description: After you gain control of a planet, gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: Nomadic
abilities.description: You can score objectives even if you do not control the planets in your home system.

abilities.name: Star Forge
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place either 2 fighters or 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your war suns.

abilities.name: Masters of Trade
abilities.description: You do not need to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the Trade strategy card.

abilities.name: Guild Ships
abilities.description: You can negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor.

abilities.name: Orbital Drop
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.description: When you gain command tokens during the Status Phase, gain 1 additional command token.

abilities.name: Quantum Entanglement
abilities.description: You treat all systems that contain a wormhole as adjacent to your home system.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: Apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system or in a system that contains a wormhole.

abilities.name: Assimilate
abilities.description: When you gain control of a planet that contains another player's structures, replace those structures with your own of the same type.

abilities.name: Harrow
abilities.description: At the start of each ground combat, your dreadnoughts in the space area of that system may use their BOMBARDMENT ability against your opponent's ground forces on that planet.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: At the start of a round of space combat, you may roll 2 dice. For each result equal to or greater than 9, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign those hits to non-fighter ships.

abilities.name: Pillage
abilities.description: After 1 of your neighbors gains trade goods or resolves a transaction, you may take 1 of those trade goods or commodities.

abilities.name: Telepathic
abilities.description: At the end of the Strategy Phase, place the Naalu '0' token on your strategy card; you are first in initiative order.

abilities.name: Foresight
abilities.description: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may place 1 token from your strategy pool in an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships; move your ships from the active system into that system.

abilities.name: Galactic Threat
abilities.description: You cannot vote on agendas. Once per agenda phase, after an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 1 technology that is owned by a player who voted for the outcome you predicted.

abilities.name: Technological Singularity
abilities.description: Once per combat, after 1 of your opponent's units is destroyed, you may gain 1 technology that is owned by that player. You cannot research technology normally.

abilities.name: Unrelenting
abilities.description: Apply +1 to the result of each of your combat rolls.

abilities.name: Fragile
abilities.description: Apply -1 to the result of each of your combat rolls.

abilities.name: Brilliant
abilities.description: When you spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the Technology strategy card, you may resolve the primary ability instead.

abilities.name: Analytical
abilities.description: When you research a technology, you may ignore 1 prerequisite on that technology.

abilities.name: Blood Ties
abilities.description: You do not need to spend influence to remove the custodians token from Mecatol Rex.

abilities.name: Reclamation
abilities.description: After you resolve a tactical action in the Mecatol Rex system, you may place 1 PDS or 1 space dock from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

abilities.name: Peace Accords
abilities.description: After you resolve the primary or secondary ability of the Diplomacy strategy card, you may gain control of 1 planet that does not contain units and is adjacent to a planet you control.

abilities.name: Quash
abilities.description: After an agenda is revealed, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool to discard that agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead.

abilities.name: Indoctrination
abilities.description: At the start of ground combat, you may spend 2 influence to replace 1 of your opponent's infantry with 1 infantry from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Devotion
abilities.description: After each space combat round, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships.

abilities.name: Stall Tactics
abilities.description: ACTION: Discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Scheming
abilities.description: When you draw 1 or more action cards, draw 1 additional action card. Then, choose 1 action card from your hand and place it on the bottom of the action card deck.

abilities.name: Crafty
abilities.description: You can have any number of action cards in your hand. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

abilities.name: Zeal
abilities.description: You always vote first during the Agenda Phase. When you cast votes, you may cast additional votes equal to the number of players in the game, including yourself.

abilities.name: Raid Formation
abilities.description: When 1 or more of your units use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, for each hit produced, you may destroy 1 of your opponent's infantry in the space area of the active system.

abilities.name: Voidborn
abilities.description: Frontier tokens in systems that contain 1 or more of your ships are not removed after they are explored.

abilities.name: Aetherpassage
abilities.description: After a player activates a system that does not contain any of your ships, you may allow that player to move their ships through systems that contain your ships.

abilities.name: Edict
abilities.description: When you win a combat, place 1 of the losing player's command tokens from their reinforcements into your fleet pool if it is not already there.

abilities.name: Genetic Recombination
abilities.description: You may negotiate transactions with players whose command tokens are in your fleet pool, even if they are not your neighbor.

abilities.name: Fabrication
abilities.description: ACTION: Either gain 1 relic fragment of any type, or purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type to gain 1 relic.

abilities.name: Supercharge
abilities.description: At the start of a combat round, you may exhaust 1 of your mechs to apply +1 to the result of each of your combat rolls during this combat round.

abilities.name: The Company
abilities.description: During setup, take the 3 Nomad agent cards; you have 3 agents.

abilities.name: Wayfaring
abilities.description: After you explore a frontier token, you may place 1 mech from your reinforcements on that planet.

abilities.name: Terragenesis
abilities.description: After you explore a planet that does not have a sleeper token, you may place or move 1 sleeper token onto that planet.

abilities.name: Awaken
abilities.description: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your sleeper tokens, you may replace each of your sleeper tokens in that system with 1 PDS from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Capture your opponent's non-structure units that are destroyed during combat in a system that contains your units with the DIMENSIONAL TEAR ability.

abilities.name: Riftwalkers
abilities.description: ACTION: Purge 2 of your captured units to research 1 technology.

abilities.name: The Tribunii
abilities.description: During setup, choose Mentak, Xxcha, or Argent Flight. Take that faction's home system tile and planet cards.

abilities.name: Law of the People
abilities.description: You may exhaust a planet you control to cast additional votes equal to that planet's influence for each law in play.

abilities.name: Galactic Threat Analysts
abilities.description: When 1 or more of your units use SPACE CANNON, you may spend 1 command token from your strategy pool to produce 1 additional hit.
